mapper.insert: insert into accident (accident_id, accident_date, accident_content, accident_price, special_note, rent_id) values (#{accident_id}, #{accident_date}, #{accident_content}, #{accident_price}, #{special_note}, #{rent_id})
mapper.select: select * from accident where accident_id > 0 order by accident_id asc limit 0, 6;
select * from accident where accident_id <= #{accident_id} and accident_id > #{accident_id} - 6 order by accident_id asc
select * from accident where accident_id >= #{accident_id} and accident_id < #{accident_id} + 6 order by accident_id asc
